jobDescription:
Summary
The Director of Digital Communications is a creative and strategic leader, responsible for developing and executing Workiva’s digital communications strategy. This leader understands content integration and leverages insights to create campaigns that promote Workiva, its brand, its innovative solutions and its thought leaders across multiple channels. As an essential member of the Global Communications Department, the Director of Digital Communications will integrate digital content such as social media into the Company’s overarching marketing and communications strategies to help drive stakeholder engagement and business growth.
Responsibilities
Develop an earned, owned and paid communications content strategy across multiple platforms and channels and lead execution through creative development, targeting and production.Work in partnership with the communications and marketing teams to manage Workiva’s digital reputation and brand as well as to ensure alignment with the overarching narrative, goals and execution.Identify new capabilities to improve content performance and regularly educate the team on digital trends that are pertinent to our business (i.e. algorithm changes, mobile update implications, competitor campaigns)Assist in creating copy for a variety of multimedia content; including web-based articles, emails, social posts, videos and podcasts.Help make content successful by working with other teams to promote content, optimize conversion paths, and build links.Set measurable objectives and key performance indicators based on business needsPlan for and lead the development of organic social media campaigns by overseeing the day-to-day management of social media communities, adhering to the overarching communications strategy, social strategy and best practice, and tone of voice.Manage ongoing optimization of the social strategy, playbook, community management, content creation and UGC to improve delivery and enhance results.Assess campaign performance, measuring against campaign goals (ROI and KPIs), and helping teams optimize via insightful actions and recommendations for further impact.Develop, optimize, and maintain paid social advertising campaigns, including coordination of assets between agencies and internal teams and budget management.
What You'll Need
Education
Undergraduate Degree or equivalent combination of education and experience in a related field.
Experience
10+ years of experience in digital media, marketing, or digital communications
Skills
Successful track record of developing and executing large, cross-channel digital communication activations with measurable results.Deep understanding of content strategy, social media platforms and their respective audiences and deployment scenarios, as well as each platform’s business standards and best practices.Proven experience with editorial SEO and creating content that ranks and converts, both written and video.Proven results building social followings that drive demandDemonstrated passion for driving big, creative ideas that drive Workiva’s business and platform strategy, and award-winning culture.Strong interpersonal skills demonstrated through working cross-functionally with key global stakeholders to achieve stated goals.Ability to simultaneously manage, coordinate, and execute a number of complex projects within stringent timelines and budget parameters.Big picture thinker who is passionate about storytelling.Strong written and verbal communication skills
Travel
Less than 10%
Working Conditions & Physical Requirements
Reliable internet access for any period of time working remotely, not in a Workiva office.
How You’ll Be Rewarded:
Salary range in the US: 

$173,000.00 - $235,000.00 Annually
A discretionary bonus typically paid annuallyRestricted Stock Units granted at time of hire401(k) match and comprehensive employee benefits package
The salary range represents the low and high end of the salary range for this job in the US. Minimums and maximums may vary based on location. The actual salary offer will carefully consider a wide range of factors, including your skills, qualifications, experience and other relevant factors.
Where You’ll Work
Our values drive how we work and who we hire. You will see these values ingrained in how we support our customers, work with team members, build our products and in the work environment we’ve created.
Customer Success: Always delight our customers.Trust: Rely on each other. Integrity: Do the right thing, every time. Collaboration: Share resources and work together. Innovation: Keep creating solutions and finding better ways. Inclusion: Support a diverse community where we all belong. Accountability: Be responsible for your success and failure.
We believe our people are our greatest asset, and our unique culture gives employees the opportunity to make an impact everyday. We give our employees the freedom and resources they need—backed by our culture of collaboration and diverse thought—to continue innovating and breaking new ground. We hire talented people with a wide range of skills and experiences who are eager to tackle some of today’s most challenging problems.
At Workiva, you’ll enjoy:
Fantastic Benefits: With coverage starting day one, choose from competitive health, dental, and vision plans on the largest physician networks available.Casual Dress: Workiva has a casual work environment, most people wear jeans to the office.Involvement: Ability to participate in Business Employee Resource Groups (Black, Hispanic, Asian, Women, Rainbow (LGBTQIA+), Veterans, Disabilities), Volunteering, Company wide celebrations, and moreWork-life Balance: We have competitive PTO, VTO and Parental Leave. We encourage employees to spend time enjoying life outside of work.
Learn more about life at Workiva: https://www.linkedin.com/company/workiva/
Learn more about benefits:  https://www.workiva.com/careers/benefits

jobDescription:
TikTok/Instagram Video Producer / Miami FL 

MISSION: Woxer is a leading Women’s Intimates apparel brand in women’s Briefs. Using the best-in-class sustainable fabrications and designs, we are pushing forward a growing market trend towards comfort and sustainability. For us at Woxer comfort always comes first. Every Woxer product is created with attention to detail, designed to deliver the perfect fit and a soft, lightweight feel. By multiple varied, unique designs across monthly new product releases, we are establishing a new standard for women of all walks of life. We want to elevate your underwear, with comfort details and craftmanship that will get you feeling like you have nothing on. As an aspirational brand, Woxer prides itself on being approachable. Anyone and everyone deserves to feel and be comfortable in Woxer.
WHERE ARE WE GOING:At Woxer we don’t only dream big, we plan big. Our goal is to become the top premium underwear brand in the United States with a global presence, while keeping our employees and customers at the forefront of everything we do. We believe in a winning office culture, will include opportunities for new leaders, a fun work environment, and cultivating an ideal work/life balance for our employees. We are committed to celebrating and achieving diversity in all facets of our business. Additionally, Woxer is focused on the development of sustainable practices, challenging ourselves to discover innovation in design production and technology.
Our creative department is looking for a Content Strategist to join our team and help bring our brand to life through the creation of engaging, unique and entertaining TikTok/IG/Facebook video content. As a Content Strategist, you will be responsible for ideating, producing content and videos, and editing videos that align with Woxer aesthetic and tone of voice.
 YOUR CORE FOCUS AREAS AND RESPONSIBILITIES WILL BE:● Strategize and mass produce captivating and entertaining TikTok/Facebook/IG video content and manage content from concept to publishing.● Collaborate with our creative team (copywriter, videographer, editor) to develop video concepts that showcase our products in an exciting and innovative way.● Create content, Edit and post videos on our social media accounts, ensuring that all videos are optimized for maximum engagement and reach.● Stay up to date with the latest Facebook/TikTok and social trends and incorporate these into our video content.● Analyze video performance metrics to identify areas of improvement and make data-driven decisions to optimize future videos.● Responsible for hiring models, securing the shoot location, and gathering the necessary team to make it happen!

WHAT DO YOU NEED TO SUCCEED● 2-4 years’ experience as video Content strategist specifically for TikTok/IG/Facebook. (Vertical angle shots)● On the ground knowledge of TikTok's current trends, and a proven track record of growing social channels.● Impeccable communication skills - both written and verbal.● Experience within publishing and/or branded content.● An understanding of the process of working on digital commercial campaigns.

MUST HAVE:● Proven experience as a Facebook/IG and TikTok Video content strategist and producer, with a strong portfolio showcasing your skills and creativity.● Must have experience hiring motion editors and videographers.● Must be able to create UGC videos.● Must have proven experience with High Converting video ads.● Strong understanding of Facebook/IG and TikTok platform and the types of content that perform well on the platform.● Excellent editing skills, including the ability to use Adobe Creative Cloud tools such as Premiere Pro and After Effects.● Experience working with e-commerce brand a plus.● Excellent communication skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.● Highly organized and detail-oriented, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.● Must be an out of the box thinker, have an open mind approach and willingness to explore different methods of doing things.
NOTE: Must be creative with content & copy as videos are not high budget videos. 
BENEFITS & PERKS
Your well-being is our top priority. Our benefits and total compensation are designed for the whole person, caring forboth you and your family.
Benefits & Perks● Work with a fun, creative & diverse team !● Competitive Salary● 25 PTO● 9 Company Holidays● 401K Plan● Medical / Dental / Vision Coverage● Life Insurance● FSA/ HSA● Accident and Critical Illness Insurance● Short-Term Disability (STD)● Long Term Disability (LTD)● Parental Medical Leave● Child Bonding Leave
The above is not an exhaustive list of duties and you will be expected to perform different tasks as necessitated by your changing role within the organization and the overall business objectives of the organization.We are an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to diversity, inclusion, and equality in the workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, race, color, age, national origin, religion, physical and mental disability, genetic information, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity/assignment, citizenship, pregnancy or maternity, protected veteran status, or any other status prohibited by applicable national, federal, state or local law.
companyDescription:
Woxer is a women's underwear brand that has designed a boxer brief tailored to women, focused on comfort, health, and sustainability.

We are taking a stand by redefining the women’s underwear space and creating a new definition and a new word - Woxer - for our category that will come to symbolize female empowerment. Our products are engineered for maximum comfort, style, and every day wear.

Since our 2019 launch as a bootstrapped startup we quickly reached profitability and have steadily increased production to meet global demand.

jobDescription:
Who We Are:At M Booth, we are a culture-first communications agency that attracts the best people and the best brands to a workplace that’s alive with courage, ideas, respect, and humanity. We are relentlessly passionate about our clients and their business, whether that means staying at the forefront of the digital and social evolution, sharpening our earned storytelling skills, or unleashing game-changing insights that result in campaigns that win in the marketplace.
We are a hybrid workforce and believe that inspiration, relevance, and leadership are about how you do it, not where you do it from. We encourage all our employees to “Be IRL” – this code stands for being Inspired Relevant Leaders. Now, more than ever, our interactions and our relationships are mission critical to our community and our success. They build a culture that enables all of us to do great things and grow together. We invite you into our world of creativity, ideation, and communication. Come Be Inspired…come work with us at M Booth. Our ever-growing Consumer team has an immediate opening for a Digital Strategist to help with several well-known beauty brands.
This is an excellent opportunity for a digital/influencer professional who wants to be part of a fun-loving team that encourages critical thinking as much as creativity (aka the best of both worlds!). We’re looking for someone who has 4-6+ years of influencer experience, and that will bring energy, excitement and passion to the position.
What You’ll Do:As a Digital Strategist, you’ll be helping oversee owned social channels and key influencer initiatives for an anchor beauty business, with a lot of opportunity for growth and visibility. You’ll manage all aspects of editorial planning and integrated influencer campaigns, from development of strategies to oversight of execution, collaborating with other paid media, and PR leads to ensure holistic programming. You’ll lead and inspire junior staffers; serve as a client counselor; and, most importantly, work with a very talented, very collaborative, and inspiring team that will have your back no matter what. In this role, you help launch a new TikTok channel for an established skincare brand, and manage an existing Instagram channel. You will source new content from creators, manage UGC and map all content to the larger communications calendar. 
Key responsibilities include:Assisting in digital/social strategy development with expertise across core digital and social channels such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat, and LinkedIn, social & paid social campaign development and management. Managing day-to-day social calendar, content production, publishing, and measurement.Overseeing third party relationships including vendors and partnersProject managing skills, preferably with experience utilizing tools such as Monday.comDeveloping integrated influencer campaign strategies, based on business/IAT needs, opportunities presented by ever-changing social landscape and previous learningsLeading influencer relations, including partner identification and vetting, outreach, negotiations, contracting, briefing, content review process, and budgetingLeading influencer campaign reporting and push team to go beyond the metrics to share actionable learnings with clientsWorking closely with integrated agency partners (IAT) to deliver campaign POVs to clients, and negotiate necessary rights with influencers to deliver assets according to planActively providing digital updates with Consumer team with the opportunity to take lead on client POVs that can be repurposed for clients across the practiceServing as client lead on influencer campaigns, including written communications and presenting on calls/meetingsMaintaining strong connections with influencers and their agentsWorking with junior teammates on campaigns and serve as their coach in the influencer space
What You’ll Bring:Bachelor’s degree or equivalent4-6 years of influencer experience working in an agency setting or in-houseExperience managing and mentoring a team of 1-2 direct reports Strong foundation in social media/influencer relations. Experience creating influencer campaign strategies and execution of all components preferredExperience in managing/working with third party influencer vendors/networks Solid understanding of paid digital and owned practices; experience working in an integrated agency (IAT) setting is a plusExperience in client management, and proven ability to lead client communicationsStrong writing skills (social copy experience is a plus)Strong analytical skills and experience tracking and interpreting dataProven ability to effectively organize multiple deadlines across accounts and teamsAbility to work independently and multi-task in a team-oriented environmentCreative, strategic thinking skillsStrong attention to detailPositive and flexible attitude
Nice to Have:Experience with influencer tools, such as Tagger Experience and/or passion for beauty/CPG brands, specifically skincareExperience working with dermatologists / dermatology brands
What We’ll Bring:Here are a few highlights of the benefits we offer at M Booth:A workplace that’s alive with courage, ideas, respect and humanityProfessional growth and development programs to help advance your careerComprehensive health care and wellness plans for your entire familyA 401(k) Savings Plan and Flexible Spending AccountsPaid holidays, Unlimited Paid Time Off (Personal, Sick, Vacation), and Summer FridaysAdditional Perks: Family Leave, Well-Being Programs, and Commuter Benefits$71,000-$85,000
Location: Remote or in the New York office
If you plan on working remotely, we can accept applicants from the following states:
Arizona, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Indiana, Kansas, Louisiana, Maryland, Massachusetts, Minnesota, Nevada, New Jersey, New York, North Carolina, Pennsylvania, Texas, and Washington D.C.
 M Booth & Associates is an equal opportunity employer. All candidates will be considered for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.
companyDescription:
M Booth runs on two words: Be Inspired. From the people we select for our teams to how we work with our clients to the passions we pursue outside the office, innovation, creativity and inspiration shape every part of our organization. 

We are a culture-first communications agency that attracts the best people and the best brands to a workplace that’s alive with courage, ideas, respect and humanity. We are relentlessly passionate about our clients and their business, whether that means staying at the forefront of the digital and social evolution, sharpening our earned storytelling skills or unleashing game-changing insights that result in campaigns that win in the marketplace. 

At M Booth, 150 employees share one title: Ideapreneurs. We think big. Move fast. And are proud of our resourceful, entrepreneurial mindset. A highly-collaborative team of account planners and media connectors, data-driven researchers and digital designers, communication experts and content makers. Creating impact for our clients through insight and innovation, we’re an agency that punches way above its weight.

At M Booth, our guiding principle is “how we do anything means everything.” Apparently, the industry has noticed: we have been awarded The Holmes Report 2016 Overall Agency of the Year and 2016 Consumer Agency of the Year; the 2016 PRWeek Midsize Agency of the Year; and the 2016 PRWeek Best Places to Work.

Fantastic Benefits: With coverage starting day one, choose from competitive health, dental, and vision plans on the largest physician networks available.Casual Dress: Workiva has a casual work environment, most people wear jeans to the office.Involvement: Ability to participate in Business Employee Resource Groups (Black, Hispanic, Asian, Women, Rainbow (LGBTQIA+), Veterans, Disabilities), Volunteering, Company wide celebrations, and moreWork-life Balance: We have competitive PTO, VTO and Parental Leave. We encourage employees to spend time enjoying life outside of work.
Learn more about life at Workiva: https://www.linkedin.com/company/workiva/
Learn more about benefits:  https://www.workiva.com/careers/benefits
Workiva is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. We believe that great minds think differently. We value diversity of backgrounds, beliefs, and interests, and we recognize diversity as an important source of intellectual thought, varied perspective, and innovation. Employment decisions are made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other protected characteristic. We strongly encourage and welcome people from historically marginalized groups to apply.
Workiva is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with disabilities. To request assistance with the application process, please email talentacquisition@workiva.com.
Workiva supports employees in working where they work best - either from an office or remotely from any location within their country of employment.
companyDescription:
Workiva’s mission is to power transparent reporting for a better world. We believe that consumers, employees, shareholders, and other stakeholders today expect more from business – more action, transparency, and disclosure of financial and non-financial information. We build solutions to meet that demand and streamline processes, connect data and teams, and ensure consistency – all within a controlled, secure, audit-ready cloud platform. 

Workiva delivers the world’s leading cloud platform for regulatory, financial and environmental, social and governance (“ESG”) reporting. Workiva provides more than 4,300 organizations with software-as-a-service solutions to help solve some of the most complex reporting and disclosure challenges. People all over the world use our connected, cloud platform to seamlessly enable collaboration and deep integration into existing work streams to simplify their most complex reporting challenges.

jobDescription:
Job description:

We have an amazing role for someone who is passionate about the social space and is extremely interested in nutrition and health and wellness. 

As a Social Media Specialist, you will drive with our consumers across our portfolio of brands in all the main social channels. 

The candidate must, be talented, creative and full of ideas on how to build consumer and community engagement and you have a strong track record of working with influencers, ambassadors and on-line groups to help inspire creativity, develop content and manage the brand positioning and brand messaging in a natural way. 

We need someone who has a customer first attitude and knows how to navigate the social space to build brands and consumer loyalty. We want someone who is obsessed with what’s new, relevant and trending. Someone who lives in the social space and can anticipate opportunities and potential issues. 

If you fit this description, and have a track record of success in social marketing then this is the role for you. 

 

The role will reside in IL 

 

Duties and Responsibilities

 Be passionate about social media. Know the social channel inside and out. Understand how consumers are using the platforms from intention, flow to available formats. Expand social strategy to relevant channels beyond our brand pages (ie Facebook groups) where it fits. Execute the social strategy for the brand. This may developing the content calendar, writing social messaging and other relevant content with the aid of our in-house creative team as well as being able to rely on your own creativity to generate ideas, write copy and quickly see when and how to jump on trends on-line. Activate influencers to achieve key brand goals. This can include building an influencer consideration set, setting evaluation criteria, outreach to influencers, writing the campaign brief, negotiation influencer program, and then selling in program to internal teams. Pending internal alignment, activate the influencer campaign from sending product, key messages, aligning on content themes, creating individual links if needed, reviewing content and routing it through legal as needed.  Monitor and suggest relevant trends, hashtags and content that fit each brands. Gain internal alignment on the social calendar. Ensure brand/creative services and legal are all aligned. Develop briefs for content as needed. Manage the shopping and product tabs on each social channel. Ensure relevant products are pulled in, displaying correct price, and driving to the right destination.  Publish content calendar flawlessly. Ensure appropriate information is included based on social platform best practices (hashtags, product tag, URL, etc.) Monitor competitive brands to understand their strategy, key consumer, and social media approach.  Permissions. Set all paid partners/influencers as partners in appropriate social platforms.  Track all influencers and ambassadors to ensure they’re posting as contracted, including key brad information and including appropriate disclosures.  Monitor UGC that features ours brands. Reshare appropriate content (ie Instagram stories) that represent the brand. Gain permission to use exceptional content on our own channels.  Gather screenshots for influencer activations.  Measurement: Pull key metrics at a predetermined basis to track performance back to goals and benchmarks. Analyze results to provide learnings as to what worked, and can be optimized moving forward. Put learnings into action across platform, content, time of day, target, etc Oversee influencer execution from contract, billing, monitoring posts, and reporting Build relationships with key internal stakeholders. Reports to Manager of Social Media  

Decision Making/Problem Solving

 Help with the monitoring and engagement of consumers through various social media channels for our GPN brands Curate the social presence of our brands through content development and execution.  Influencer monitoring and reporting.   

Education

  4 year -BA/BS degree required in a marketing or business related field.  

Experience

 2+years experience in a relevant role   

Other Experience:

 Experience using Sprinklr or other social listening tools A strong collaborator with the ability and a track record of successfully managing cross functional partnerships.  Well-developed organizational and project management skills to manage multiple brands and initiatives simultaneously. A passionate social expert Manage through a data oriented and test and learn mindset  Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills Customer oriented and results focused
companyDescription: Glanbia Performance Nutrition (GPN) is a wholly owned subsidiary of Glanbia plc (ISE/LSE: GLAPF), a global nutrition company. At GPN, our mission is to inspire people everywhere to achieve their performance, healthy lifestyle and weight management goals across every life stage. Our leading brands include Optimum Nutrition®, BSN®, think! ®, Isopure®, Amazing Grass® and Slimfast®, Body & Fit®, LevlUp®, among others. Visit glanbiaperformancenutrition.com or glanbia.com to learn more.
jobIndustries: Consumer Goods, Food & Beverages, Food Production

jobDescription:
ABOUT US:

Braintrust is a user-owned talent network that connects you with great jobs with no fees or membership costs—so you keep 100% of what you earn.

ABOUT THE HIRING PROCESS:

When you join Braintrust, you will be invited to a screening process for Braintrust to learn more about your previous work experiences. Once completed, you will have access to the employer for this role and other top companies that seek high-quality talent. Apply to this job to kick off the process.
JOB TYPE: Freelance, Contract Position (no agencies/C2C - see notes below)LOCATION: Remote - United States only (TimeZone: EST | Partial overlap)HOURLY RANGE: Our client is looking to pay $30 – $40/hrESTIMATED DURATION: 40h/week - Long term

THE OPPORTUNITY
This hybrid role must be available to work out of Brooklyn office as needed (minimum 1x per week) Our client is seeking a Social Video Specialist to support video content creation across their global social media channels. Reporting to the Sr. Manager, Social Video Lead, the Social Video Specialist will work closely with social channel leads to create compelling video content that elevates small business owners, celebrates creativity, and sparks conversation with the millions of buyers and sellers in their global community.

Availability

40 hours per week

12 month contract, with potential to extend

The Social Video Specialist will be responsible for: 
Executing remote and in-person social content capture (e.g. video capture, voice over)Communicating directly with buyers and sellers for video projects: building briefs and guidelines, seeking rights approvals, providing creative feedback and keeping projects on deadlineWorking directly with social content creators to help enable their work by sourcing, vetting and acquiring approved merchandise from their seller communityIdentifying and cataloging UGC content from their seller and buyer community, and helping to edit and optimize this content for their channelsSourcing and tracking new social content creators and stories from their seller and buyer communitiesCollaborating with channel leads to brainstorm, pitch and develop new content formats, series and franchises across channelsSurfacing new ideas and opportunities to the team, informed by cultural trends, industry news and competitive insights

The Social Media Coordinator will demonstrate:
1-2 years experience creating social media content for a large brand or publisherDeep knowledge of the social media landscape (particularly TikTok), especially in the key areas of home & living, style & accessories, and giftingPossess a keen awareness of the difference between successful consumer and brand content as well as a discerning eye for what makes video content successful on social channelsExperience developing video content for a brand and the ability to write copy in a social brand voiceExperience organizing, tracking, and managing a variety of information and data through spreadsheets and/or CMS toolsA strong eye for art direction and merchandising as well as an interest in unearthing and transforming community stories into compelling social contentAbility to work both independently and collaboratively to execute new ideas and projectsA passion for supporting small businesses, creativity and craftsmanship. You care deeply about building and protecting the brand.

Apply Now!

Braintrust Job ID: 6251

C2C Candidates: This role is not available to C2C candidates working with an agency. If you are a professional contractor who has created an LLC/corp around their consulting practice, this is well aligned with Braintrust and we’d welcome your application.

Braintrust values the multitude of talents and perspectives that a diverse workforce brings. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, religion, age, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, or protected veteran status.
companyDescription:
Braintrust is the first decentralized Web3 talent network that connects skilled, vetted knowledge workers with the world’s leading companies. The community that relies on Braintrust to find work are the same people who own and build it, ensuring the network always serves the needs of its users, instead of a centrally-controlled corporation. And because the community of knowledge workers and contributors earns ownership and control of Braintrust through its native BTRST token for their contributions to the network and its growth, new Talent and jobs have participated in the network at record speeds. 

Braintrust has over 700,000+ community members, with knowledge workers and project contributors across the world. Braintrust is trusted by hundreds of Fortune 1000 global enterprises including Nestlé, Porsche, Atlassian, Goldman Sachs, and Nike. For more information, visit: www.braintrust.com.

BTRST is available on Coinbase.com and in the Coinbase Android and iOS apps. Coinbase customers can trade, send, receive, or store BTRST in most Coinbase-supported regions. For more information on Braintrust and the BTRST token, read the “Braintrust: The Decentralized Talent Network” whitepaper.

jobDescription:
Are you an experienced and passionate social media professional? Are you looking to work in a highly collaborative environment led by a growth mindset leadership team? Tractor Supply is seeking a Social Media Manager to join our corporate Marketing team. Under the guidance of a Senior Marketing Manager, you will be directly responsible for managing Tractor Supply’s organic and paid social media programs. You will help enhance engagement with our loyal customer base and play a key role in growing our emerging customer cohorts. You will make meaningful contributions to the company’s success by leading the social strategy to drive brand awareness, loyalty, and sales. 
Location:  Nashville, TN (Relo Provided)Compensation:  Base, Bonus & Long-Term Incentive
What will you work on?
Paid SocialOversee paid social media campaigns including strategy, optimization, measurement, and budget managementManage social media agency relationshipLead paid social influencer program including strategy, creative vision, execution, and measurementPresent strategies, analysis and key learnings regularly to senior leadership and various stakeholdersIdentify trends, relevant news and other opportunities in the social media space. Maintain awareness and understanding of emerging social media platforms and best-in-class tacticsParticipate in Media Mix Modeling activities to analyze media effectiveness/ROI and productivity in order to ensure ongoing effectiveness and efficiency in media plans Organic Social Manage organic content creation for Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest, and Tik Tok, working closely with creative team and internal marketing partners to execute engaging content that aligns to our broader marketing strategy and complements our brand voiceOversee monthly content calendar planning, creative content development, scheduling of posts, and reporting against KPIsProvide best-in-class recommendations on overall social strategy and emerging platformsApprove UGC content that aligns with brand guidelinesFoster customer brand advocates and lead social customer surprise and delight activationsPartner with National marketing team to amplify campaigns in social channelsInnovate, oversee, and manage social creative by developing creative briefs and partnering with internal and external designersSocial Listening, Crisis Management, Reporting & Sprinklr Platform AdministrationManage the social listening program and strategy by serving as the Sprinklr platform administrator, monitoring online conversations, creating listening dashboards, providing reporting and insights, and sharing relevant trends with leadershipProvide insights and reporting for social crisis situations in accordance with crisis guidelinesSocial Customer CareCo-Lead the Social Customer Care strategy in partnership with the Customer Solutions Center to serve our customers in social channels
Experience: 5+ years of experience working in digital and social media strategy, planning or buying at an enterprise corporate level, brand or media agency. Strong understanding of social media landscape including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, Pinterest, Tik Tok, and emerging platforms.
Education: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Public Relations, Communications, Journalism or a related field from and accredited college or university. Any suitable combination of education and experience will be considered.
Other knowledge, skills or abilities:A mix of agency and client-side experience is highly preferredProven ability to effectively manage multiple projects in a fast-paced, highly demanding environmentHighly organized, self-starter with excellent verbal communication skillsCollaborative, creative and adaptive work styleStrong leadership, project management and presentation skillsExcellent reporting and analytical skills, both quantitative and qualitative, with strong attention to detailDemonstrates strong knowledge and thorough understanding of the principles of marketing, advertising, promotional and digital contentMust be skilled in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)Experience with marketing platforms such as Sprinklr, Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, and Spark), and Kenshoo, are a plusClear understanding of social performance metrics and KPIs.Knowledge of analytics and reporting tools like Facebook Analytics and Google AnalyticsExperience managing social for a large brandExperience with copywriting and editing of social copy
Company OverviewTractor Supply Company (TSCO), the largest rural lifestyle retailer in the United States, is dedicated to enhancing our strong company culture built on our Team Members’ commitment to our Mission and Values. With over 2,000 stores in 49 states and an innovative e-commerce platform, Tractor Supply ranks in the Fortune 300 with annual revenues of more than $12 billion and growing! Come grow your career with us as we serve those who live “Life out Here”! Tractor Supply Company offers a competitive Benefits package, including Medical, Dental, & Vision plans, to all Full-time Team Members as well as Part-time Team Members who are deemed eligible based on a minimum hours requirement. In addition, TSC offers access to other Benefits such as a Health Savings Account, Life Insurance, 401(k), and an Employee Stock Purchase Plan.
companyDescription:
Tractor Supply Company, the largest rural lifestyle retailer in the United States, has been passionate about serving our unique niche, as a one-stop shop for recreational farmers, ranchers and all those who enjoy living the rural lifestyle, for more than 80 years.

We offer an extensive mix of products necessary to care for home, land, pets and animals with a focus on product localization, exclusive brands and legendary customer service that addresses the needs of the Out Here lifestyle. With over 46,000 team members and annual revenues over $12 billion, Tractor Supply leverages our physical store assets with digital capabilities to offer customers the convenience of purchasing products they need anytime, anywhere and any way they choose at the everyday low prices they deserve. We operate more than 2,000 Tractor Supply stores in 49 states, 8 Distribution Centers and an e-commerce website at www.TractorSupply.com.

Tractor Supply also owns and operates Petsense, a small-box pet specialty supply retailer focused on meeting the needs of pet owners, primarily in small and mid-size communities, and offering a variety of pet products and services. We operate 183 Petsense stores in 25 states. For more information on Petsense, visit www.Petsense.com.

For a complete list of our job opportunities, please visit our careers website at www.tractorsupply.jobs.

jobDescription:
At Henkel, you can be a game changer and craft your career. Unleash your entrepreneurial spirit by bringing your ideas to life within a global team. Our leading brands and technologies, along with our high-performing businesses will provide you with countless opportunities to develop your skills and explore new paths. Your career at Henkel will contribute to a more sustainable future, while you grow within our vibrant, diverse culture of trust and belonging. If you're up for challenging the status quo, join our team of pioneers and make your mark on the future with us.
Do you dare to make an impact?
 Your Role 
A thought leader: bring new and impactful ideas, technologies, and agencies to continually and strategically drive Kenra Professional as a marketing & digital leader in professional hair, in partnership with the Product Development (PD) team A storyteller: Create and execute yearly campaigns to support innovation and legacy SKUs, in alignment with PD, Sales & Key Account strategies and goals. Strong multi-discipline abilities are required including print, ecomm/web, social, PR, influencers, leveraging all holistically for high ROI/ROAS A social expert: Plan and create, via both on trend branded and UGC, daily / weekly content supporting all channels: TT, IG, FB, YT, Pinterest, customer websites e.g. Ulta, Amazon content An analytical mindset with a creative vision: Research digital & industry trends, leveraging market knowledge into actionable strategies for appealing and modern content creation (video, tutorials, flat lays, web/email) This role will have responsibility for the Integrated Marketing, Social, and in house content creation team (expected 3-4 direct reports with 9 total FTE) 

 YOUR SKILLS 
 In your application please provide links to the following: A past or current TT, IG, FB, and YT channel that you manage.A portfolio or link to branded content campaigns you have steered the creation of. Bachelor’s degree in marketing, communications, digital transformation, business, or relevant marketing experience. Masters or MBA preferred 6-8 years marketing experience, with 4+ years of successful people management across multiple marketing disciplines All brand or agency side marketing experiences encouraged to apply, regardless of industry. Beauty is preferred, but not mandatory Experience in managing DEI to be a strength across campaigns, ensuring content is relevant and targeted based on specific products usage Strong intrapersonal skills, able to successfully navigate myriad agencies, influencers, and internal team agendas Entrepreneurial mindset for marketing, balanced with the resilience required to work in a large corporation with specific protocols and procedures 
The salary for this role is $125,000.00 - $140,000.00. This is the range that we in good faith anticipate relying on when setting wages for this position. We may ultimately pay more or less than the posted range and this range is only applicable for jobs to be performed in California. This salary range may also be modified in the future.
Henkel does not accept unsolicited resumes from search firms or employment agencies. Unsolicited referrals and resumes are considered Henkel property and therefore, Henkel will not pay a fee for any placement resulting from the receipt of an unsolicited referral. At Henkel's request only, preferred vendors may be invited to refer talent for specific open positions. In these cases, a fully-executed agreement with Henkel must be in place and current.
All employees applying for an internal position must have a discussion with his/her manager about their interest in a job posting opportunity. The discussion will not preclude the employee from interviewing if their skills meet the job requirements.
Henkel is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, veteran status, age, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, and other legally protected characteristics.
companyDescription:
Henkel operates worldwide with leading innovations, brands and technologies in two business areas: Adhesive Technologies and Consumer Brands.

Founded in 1876, Henkel looks back on more than 145 years of success. The company holds leading positions with its two business units in both industrial and consumer businesses thanks to strong brands, innovations and technologies such as Persil, Schwarzkopf and Loctite. Henkel, headquartered in Düsseldorf / Germany, counts among the most internationally aligned German-based companies in the global marketplace.

Our company purpose expresses what unites us all at Henkel: Pioneers at heart for the good of generations. We are a diverse team of more than 50,000 colleagues worldwide, striving to enrich and improve life every day through our products, services, and solutions. Our Purpose is built from our roots and carries a long-standing legacy of innovation, responsibility, and sustainability into the future. Our shared values and Leadership Commitments guide our decisions and actions every day.

Imprint: http://www.henkel.com/imprint
Data Privacy: https://www.henkel.com/data-protection-statement-social-media

jobDescription:
Influencer Relations Specialist will have a primary focus on helping support all social media posts, influencers, and social media initiatives. This role will consist of strategizing social media influencer campaigns, outreach, & managing social relationships & profiles.
ResponsibilitiesThis position will be responsible for growing ClarityX influencer network, online presence, management of influencer UGC (User Generated Content), and driving brand awareness on social platforms. This position will be responsible for outreach, managing influencers, and creating and managing UGC across multiple social media platforms. 
Qualifications-2+ years directly managing social media influencers & campaigns-A creative-minded individual with the ability to conceive, articulate and produce innovative ideas for new content-Effective communication skills - both verbal and written-Well organized with excellent time management skills -Self-starter with a determination to achieve corporate goals & objectives
companyDescription:
ClarityX believes in taking the guesswork out of your healthcare. We believe that one size does not fit all when it comes to your medication or treatments. Individualized personal medicine is the future of healthcare. 

ClarityX pharmacogenetics testing empowers both patients and physicians. We deliver on that promise everyday by helping patients with convenient, easily accessible in-home testing options.

ClarityX incorporates the most up-to-date clinical guidance from key scientific and government organizations including Clinical Pharmacogenetics Implementation Consortium (CPIC) and the Federal Drug Administration (FDA).

https://www.clarityxdna.com

jobTitle: Senior Manager, Global Communications - AERIN Beauty
jobDescription:
Position Summary

Working closely with the VP/GM of AERIN Beauty and VP of Global Communications lead and brand founder/creative director, Aerin Lauder; as well as wider Global AERIN Beauty and LLC teams, this role is responsible for supporting the brand’s growth through strategic launches and collaborations; elevated experiential events and tiered gifting; global influencer ambassador programs; and development of carefully cadenced storylines to help markets achieve meaningful, high-caliber press opportunities for both AERIN and Aerin Lauder.

Responsibilities

Global Strategy Development & Local Implementation Support
Develop Global Communications strategy (with approval from VP, AERIN and VP, Global Communications) that helps refine and articulate brand identity, broadens relevancy and reach, and enhances consumer engagementCreate and actualize annual Global Communications calendar including launches, media relations, product storylines, strategic pitches, events and partnerships With oversight from VP's, cascade overall brand strategy with clear guidelines for execution to regions and affiliates, ensuring strong, locally relevant brand storytelling to amplify brand reach and engagement across markets and channels; oversee the delivery of product and brand information to press on global level Finance and Budget Management build out annual Communications budget, allocating and assigning investment priorities based upon key brand & departmental objectives, with final approval from VP’sTrack & review ROI analysis on platforms and influencer programs to guide future investments, and provide measurable results that prove the achievement of brand’s Global Communications objectives
360 Ideation & Creative Collaborations
Identify opportunities with new brand, media and platform partners, integrating founder-led creative ideas into overall strategy and calendarWork cross-functionally to ideate and realize powerful 360 brand initiatives that drive aspiration, awareness and multi-channel engagement (creative, product marketing and consumer engagement), and generate high-caliber content to leverage across global social platformsPartner with VP's on ideation and realization of strategic Global Ambassador program to amplify key AERIN products, seasonal moments, and themes – including influencer curation, SOW build-out and content approvalsSupport regions in developing local partnership strategies and events that amplify key brand launches and business prioritiesCollaborate with VP's on development and manage execution of philanthropic partnership program with strong brand affinity (Every Mother Counts) to position AERIN as purpose driven brand and inspire consumers identify ongoing opportunities for support, alignment, and engagement with EMC, including fund-raising, special events and content creationLead year-round strategic program to attract and engage next generation of AERIN consumers Devise socially dynamic content calendar animating #AERINBEAUTYGIRLS theme, leveraging Gen Z/Young Millennial creators/influencer community
Cross Functional Player
Partner with Creative team Generate fresh and engaging campaign ideas that deliver on program goals and deepen loyalty and affinity; collaborate on invitations and creative mailers supporting key events, launches and seasonal press/tastemaker/influencer giftingPartner with Consumer Engagement/Digital/Social teams Ensure cohesive and compelling consumer experience across E-commerce, in-store and social and digital channels; collaborate on build-out of rich social calendar including thematic on-site editorials, social storytelling and elevated UGC, and consumer facing eventsPartner with Product Marketing team Identify, secure & produce brand collaborations that drive press & social buzz, enrich brand equity, and increase awareness In partnership with VP's, oversee and manage in-house PR team, and identify/source/direct outside PR agencies and consultants where applicableLeverage strong relationships with media contacts, both new and long-standing, on behalf of brand and founder, especially in Home market (North America)
Eventing & PR tools
Stratgize & implement press/event/social support for new counter, freestanding store, and pop-up openings Leverage brand’s home & lifestyle equity to maximize relevancy, buzz, and press opportunities for AERIN Beauty Oversee development and approval of all press copy (releases, interviews, Q&As, and media alerts); Preparation of all press briefs and event run-of-show documentsEnhance sharing of best practices globally and encourage optimization of existing initiatives
Brand Gatekeeper
Crisis Management address all public concerns and social responsibility issues related to brand in a timely and proactive manner, in partnership with AERIN Beauty Global Communications VP and ELC Corporate Communications leads
COMPETENCIES
Thinks Strategically Takes a broad view of the business, industry, and consumer environment to anticipate and plan for the future. Identifies the focus and defines where to play, how to win and what capabilities and management systems are required.Builds Collaborative Relationships Builds relationships based on trust and respect. Promotes the inclusion of diverse knowledge, skills, and experiences to achieve results.Strives for Excellence in Execution Proactively seeks ways to improve personal and organizational effectiveness to meet current and future business needs. Learns equally from successes and failures.
Qualifications

QUALIFICATIONS
Understanding context of licensor relation and founder brand leadership 5+ years of experience in PRExperience translating luxury brand equity and strategic business plan to PR and execute strategies that lead and grow the brand in line with visionProven PR track record, strategic mindset, creative, team player and budget managementProven leadership and team management skills. Strong cross-functional collaboration skills. Strong global experience with a deep knowledge for local needs and nuances Creative problem solver able to thrive in fast paced environment Big-picture thinker and experience in a dynamic, high-growth environmentMust possess excellent creative, verbal and written communication skills and strong attention to detail Strong leadership, influence, organizational and management skills. Collaborative.Excellent written, verbal and presentation communication skills
The anticipated base salary range for this position is $95,000 to $156,000. Exact salary depends on several

factors such as experience, skills, education, and budget. Salary range may vary based on

geographic location. In addition to base salary, this position is eligible for participation in a

highly competitive bonus program with possibility for overachievement based on performance

and company results as well as participation in the share incentive plan.

In addition, The Estée Lauder Companies offers a variety of benefits to eligible employees,

including health insurance coverage, wellness and family support programs, life and disability

insurance, retirement savings plans, paid leave programs, education-related programs, paid

holidays and vacation time, and many others. Many of these benefits are subsidized or fully paid

for by the company.

Job Communications / Public Relations

Primary Location US-NY-New York

Job Type Standard

Schedule Full-time

Shift 1st (Day) Shift

jobDescription:
adQuadrant helps DTC (direct-to-consumer) brands dream bigger. We are a trusted advisor that provides holistic, strategic omni-channel digital marketing solutions by partnering our clients to solve the biggest challenges in terms of customer acquisition and growth. Our efforts produce tangible results backed by measurable data. We have the strategic capabilities, quantitative chops, deep creative understanding, and world-class talent with the best tools to drive revenue and profits. We are not simply a vendor checking boxes — our seasoned team serves as an extension of the companies we work with, leading strategy and execution. Our goal is to be the go-to marketing consultants for solving the biggest challenges.

adQuadrant is looking for a Video Editor / Producer that has experience in paid media and UGC. This role will concept creatives and execute video edits for our paid media campaigns. The ideal candidate will have some film production experience and a track record of creating engaging creatives that sell using paid digital and the paid social space. Ideally the candidate will have experience in the direct-to-consumer space, with an emphasis in e-commerce and UGC.

Requirements

Your Responsibilities: 
Produce high quality videos to be used in social media advertising campaignsEffectively execute end-to-end conception, design and development of video creatives for multiple clients. Pioneer new creative thinking for paid advertising in the digital space on platforms such as Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, Reddit, and Pinterest.Maintain the visual integrity of multiple brands by ensuring consistent brand identity and design continuity across all client marketing videosIdeate and script your video concepts in a clear voice to tell a specific story about a product to a specific audience, scaling what works well and changing what doesn'tAnalyze and identify performance trends in creativesSolid understanding of user-centered design principles and patterns

Qualifications:
At least 3 years of experience as a video focused editor for an agency or brandHighly proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Premiere Pro, and After Effects)Track record of creating engaging creative work in digital channelsStrong knowledge of typographyHave the ability to manage multiple projects in a fast-paced, deadline-sensitive, data-driven environmentKeen attention to detail and ability to translate branding concepts into thumb-stopping videosCreative and innovative thinking skillsFlexibility, adaptability, and willingness to learnBe open to feedback and share ideas and opinions of their ownPossess a positive, passionate and professional attitudePossess good written and verbal communication skills 

Please send a resume and digital portfolio featuring examples of graphic or interactive design work to be considered for this position.

Benefits

Our people come first. No jerks. No egos. Just people who like to work hard and enjoy winning as a team.
Annual Compensation: $65,000 - $75,000 per yearExcellent Health Benefits (health, dental, vision, and life insurance)401K + company matchUnlimited Vacation PolicyPaid Sick Leave2 Mindfulness Days Annually2PM Fridays each week$300/ year to equip your work space with new equipment$30/ month for home internetAn extremely supportive and fun company culture

We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
companyDescription:
adQuadrant is a team of e-commerce brand builders specializing in creative, omni-channel and attribution strategies, and full-funnel execution. Working with some of the most ambitious brands in e-commerce, we’ve generated over a billion dollars in attributable revenue by providing our clients with the thought leadership, creative capabilities and top-tier talent they need to stay ahead of their competition. Together with our incredibly valuable industry partnerships, including our Google Premier Partner status, we work with clients throughout the e-commerce world to deliver scalable marketing solutions across a vast array of B2C industries - from e-mobility and nutrition to fashion and sportswear, and beyond.

Our home is Orange County, California, but our amazing team of experts spans the North American Continent. They all possess qualifications recognized throughout the advertising industry and come with a significant understanding of branding, purchase journeys and how ad spend affects a brand’s bottom line.

In short, we help our clients sleep like babies every night by providing thoughtful digital marketing experiences that make sense, converting customers and driving e-commerce brand revenue at scale.

jobDescription:
Job Summary: 13News Now/WVEC, Tegna’s ABC affiliate in Norfolk, Virginia, is searching for a Digital Content Producer who thrives in a fast-paced environment and has an audience-first approach to writing, producing and distributing digital content. The person in this role will use SEO strategies, monitor digital audience trends and practice audience listening to identify and craft engaging web content and drive content decisions across the station’s digital platforms.
Successful Digital Content Producers at 13News Now are leaders in the newsroom, responsible for the audience experience on digital, social media and streaming platforms. They should take initiative in creating content around key digital audience drivers, like breaking and trending news, weather, sports, and politics, that engages and broadens our audience. And they are able to track multiple streams of communication and information, prioritize tasks and manage/produce content created by others, including copy editing, for our various digital platforms.
Qualified candidates should be strong writers, first, with the ability to write quickly and accurately. They should also have solid news judgment and experience producing/packaging and copy-editing content for digital platforms. A working knowledge of SEO and social media strategy as well as CMS, video-editing and photo-editing software is preferred.
Responsibilities
  Write and distribute original and breaking news content  Edit reporter stories for grammar, content and structure using AP style  Use creative production techniques like graphics and media (viewer pictures, UGC, etc.) to enhance stories  Write in an exciting, captivating and authentic manner  Research for facts and credibility  Use consumer analytics, i.e., Google Data Studio, Google Trends, Crowdtangle, and Taboola Newsroom, in determining content creation  Perform other tasks as required by supervisor or digital executive producers
Requirements
  BA/BS in journalism, communications or related field  3-5 years of experience  Has strong news and editorial judgment, and understands the tenets of professional journalism  Strong knowledge of AP style and copy editing  Experience in online CMS, photo and video-editing systems preferred  Be well-versed in SEO best-practices  Skills in producing engaging, audience-driven content  Strong social media skills on platforms, including Instagram, Twitter and Facebook  Knowledge of ENPS, Photoshop and Edius is a plus  An understanding of reading and interpreting digital metrics is a plus  Organizational skills and the ability to work under constant time pressure deadlines  Ability to calmly handle live, breaking news situations and rapidly changing events
About TEGNA
TEGNA Inc. (NYSE: TGNA) is an innovative media company that serves the greater good of our communities. Across platforms, TEGNA tells empowering stories, conducts impactful investigations and delivers innovative marketing solutions. With 63 television stations in 51 U.S. markets, TEGNA is the largest owner of top 4 network affiliates in the top 25 markets among independent station groups, reaching approximately 39 percent of all television households nationwide. TEGNA also owns leading multicast networks True Crime Network and Quest. TEGNA Marketing Solutions (TMS) offers innovative solutions to help businesses reach consumers across television, digital and over-the-top (OTT) platforms, including Premion, TEGNA’s OTT advertising service. For more information, visit www.TEGNA.com.
TEGNA requires all employees to be fully vaccinated (as defined by the CDC) against the coronavirus.
EEO Statement
TEGNA Inc. is a proud equal opportunity employer. We are a drug free, EEO employer committed to a diverse workforce. We encourage and consider all qualified candidates regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, age, marital status, personal appearance, sexual orientation, gender identity, family responsibilities, disability, enrollment in college or vocational school, political affiliation, veteran status or genetic information. TEGNA complies with all applicable laws related to accommodations.

companyDescription:
As one of the most geographically diverse broadcasters in the U.S., TEGNA Inc. is an innovative media company that serves the greater good of our communities. Across platforms, TEGNA tells empowering stories, conducts impactful investigations and delivers innovative marketing solutions. With 64 television stations in 51 U.S. markets, TEGNA is the largest owner of top 4 network affiliates in the top 25 markets among independent station groups, reaching approximately 39 percent of all television households nationwide. TEGNA also owns leading multicast networks True Crime Network, Twist and Quest. TEGNA also offers innovative solutions to help businesses reach consumers across television, digital and over-the-top (OTT) platforms, including Premion, TEGNA’s OTT advertising service.
 
In everything we do, we are driven by our strongly held values and our stated purpose to serve the greater good of our communities. TEGNA produces trusted, impactful and innovative content across platforms. We tell stories that matter, are an advocate for those in need and help bring positive change to our communities. Our award-winning journalists have been recognized with numerous national honors including Edward R. Murrow, Alfred I. duPont, George Foster Peabody, George Polk, Walter Cronkite and Emmy awards.
 
In 2021, for the second consecutive year, we were recognized by the global nonprofit Points of Light as part of the Civic 50 and one of the nation’s most community-minded companies in the U.S. We also received an inaugural Greater Good Award from Digiday and were recognized as one of Achievers 50 most engaged workplaces. We were also recognized for a sixth consecutive year as a Best Place to Work for LGBTQ Equality by the Human Rights Campaign Foundation with a score of 100 on the Corporate Equality Index. The Women’s Forum of New York recognized our leadership in Board gender parity with 42 percent female representation. You can read more at TEGNA.com/social-responsibility.

jobDescription:
Imaging Brands, an Arizona-based developer and manufacturer of innovative, high-tech accessories for the professional photography market, is seeking a skilled social media marketing professional. This position will build content, write, curate and deploy marketing programs via social media platforms, encompassing organic, paid and partner marketing programs. Working directly with Marketing and Sales, this position connects with both B2C and B2B audience relationships.  Essential Job Responsibilities  · Analyze the company’s digital marketing plan and social media strategy. Identify strategic opportunities and make recommendations for improvements to marketing strategy · Create actionable plans to expand audience & engagement on social media platforms, YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok.· Design and implement social media strategy to align with business goals· Develop paid social media advertising. Manage audience and campaign development. · Plan and execute editorial calendar for social channels, manage daily activity for social media platform communications and promotions. Generate, edit, publish and share engaging content daily (e.g.original photos, videos, text and news)· Work with influencers, UGC, and marketing partners to engage new customers· Communicate with followers, respond to queries in a timely manner, monitor reviews and increase loyalty of existing customers. Collaborate with marketing, sales and customer service to ensure brand consistency and excellent customer experience· Research social media trends and inform management of changes that are relevant to the company’s marketing activities. Plan and take action on new trends· Monitor and analyze work. Interpret market data, web traffic and conversion metrics. Learn from and shift activity to achieve desired results. · Stay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design and applications.· This role encompasses both strategy and all social execution. The ideal candidate will have the following technical qualifications · Experience in creating social media strategies· Knowledge of best practices for social media platforms such as YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Tik Tok, Twitter, Pinterest, etc.· Excellent verbal and written communication skills · A bachelor’s degree in marketing, business or related field is required · 3-5 years of related work experience or an equivalent combination of training, experience, and/or education · Proven work experience and success in digital & social marketing· Proficiency in most of the following tools & technologies: Creator Skills: photography & video capture and editing abilities· Working knowledge of ad serving tools, with experience setting up and optimizing PPC campaigns· Campaign reporting & Google Analytics understanding · Photography Specific Software Familiarity (e.g. Lightroom, CaptureOne, PhotoShop/Basic Adobe Suite) · WooCommerce, Shopify and/or Amazon knowledge is a plus.· Understanding of SEO/SEM, and social media advertising campaigns· Solid knowledge of website and marketing analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Net Insight, Omniture, WebTrends, SEMRush, Hootsuite, Social scheduling tools, etc.)

Interpersonal Skills  
· Passion for working in the photography & video industry · Interest in and experience writing/conversing about technology · Self-motivated, accountable, professional, results-driven· Well-organized and able to work well with people, both taking and giving direction, to accomplish projects· Ability to work fast, independently, meet rapid deadlines and adjust to changing workload · Ability to keep on top of ongoing communications while creating and managing projects; detail and process-oriented.· Excellent customer service and relationship building skills · Experience in product marketing preferred  Benefits   · Competitive salary and career growth opportunities, based on experience· Competitive benefits include Health, Dental and Vision with company contribution· Life insurance, AD&D, short-term and long-term disability · Generous 401K Match Program · Excellent Product Discounts · Hybrid/Remote Work Option· Paid time off and sick leave· Increasing vacation time with tenure, as well as additional company days off· Collegial work environment
